document.stem: The Telstra Air card in the Advanced View displays whether the Telstra Air function is up or not. With Telstra Air, you can share a part of your broadband access with other Telstra broadband users. These users will only have access to the broadband source and by no means have access to your local network or devices.
document.p: To open the Telstra Air page, click the Telstra Air card in the Advanced View .
The Telstra Air page. following section are available:
document.li1:
Global Information
Displays whether the Telstra Air function is up or not.

WiFi Status
This section displays the status of the Telstra Air access points and the number of users that are currently connected to them.
